column2: but I like the other locations better (mostly due to parking availability) For breakfast
column3: I love the french toast and the sausage is really good. My favorite lunch or dinner item is the turkey burger
column4: hands down- it is served with some KICKASS pesto on top
column5: which is fantastic. I also love whatever the magical seasoning is that they sprinkle on top of their fries. Yum.
